source.34ab76a3:
fig , ax = plt.subplots(1,2,figsize=(15,5))
sns.distplot(data_df[data_df.Survived == 1][data_df.Sex == 'female']['Age'].fillna(-60),ax=ax[0])
sns.distplot(data_df[data_df.Survived == 0][data_df.Sex == 'female']['Age'].fillna(-60),ax=ax[0])
ax[0].set_title('female')
ax[0].legend(['dead','alive'])

sns.distplot(data_df[data_df.Survived == 1][data_df.Sex == 'male']['Age'].fillna(-60),ax=ax[1])
sns.distplot(data_df[data_df.Survived == 0][data_df.Sex == 'male']['Age'].fillna(-60),ax=ax[1])
ax[1].set_title('male')
ax[1].legend(['dead','alive'])
plt.show()

source.3a10a092:
data_df['Family'] = data_df['SibSp'] + data_df['Parch']

fig,ax = plt.subplots(1,2,figsize=(10,5))
tmp_df = data_df.groupby('Family')['Survived'].mean()-0.5
display(tmp_df)
sns.countplot(data_df['Family'],hue=data_df['Survived'],ax=ax[0])

sns.barplot(tmp_df.index,tmp_df,ax=ax[1])
plt.legend(loc='upper right')
plt.show()
